title: WPI inflation surges to 16-month high of 3.36 per cent in June on costlier vegetables
description: WPI inflation surges to 16-month high of 3.36 per cent in June on costlier vegetables Wholesale inflation in India reached a 16-month high of 3.36% in June, driven by rising prices of food articles, especially vegetables, and manufactured items. This marks the fourth consecutive month of increasing ...
